paper_abstract: Embedded System Education, has become an, important part of information disciplines' teaching programs, and attracted educators' attention, in China. To counter the deficiency of practice training in some graduates' courses a new curriculum "'Hardware/Software integrated design of embedded systems" is given, at Tsinghna University. The course's main contents, teaching activities' arrangements, basic/research experiments, and a few kinds of embedded, teaching experimental platforms are introduced. The merits and differences between the course and existing courses are indicated, and the necessity to build a powerful experimental environment for graduates to get practice skill is stressed.
paper_title: Hardware/software integrated training on embedded systems
